IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE POTSDAM COLLEGE FOUNDATION IS TO SECURE AND MANAGE PRIVATE FINANCIAL SUPPORT AND OTHER GIFTS THAT BUILD A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE FOR SUNY POTSDAM. THE FOUNDATION IS COMMITTED TO THE COLLEGE'S GOAL TO RECRUIT AND RETAIN STUDENTS, AND ENHANCE THEIR EXPERIENCES IN AND OUT OF THE CLASSROOM. THE FOUNDATION STEWARDS ITS RESOURCES FOR THE LONG-TERM BENEFIT OF SUNY POTSDAM WHILE ALSO PROVIDING THE MAXIMUM POSSIBLE CURRENT FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO THE COLLEGE AND ITS STUDENTS, CONSISTENT WITH THE WISHES OF THE FOUNDATION'S GENEROUS DONORS.
IRS990.MissionDesc: THE MISSION OF THE POTSDAM COLLEGE FOUNDATION IS TO SECURE AND MANAGE PRIVATE FINANCIAL SUPPORT AND OTHER GIFTS THAT BUILD A SUSTAINABLE FUTURE FOR SUNY POTSDAM. THE FOUNDATION IS COMMITTED TO THE COLLEGE'S GOAL TO RECRUIT AND RETAIN STUDENTS, AND ENHANCE THEIR EXPERIENCES IN AND OUT OF THE CLASSROOM. THE FOUNDATION STEWARDS ITS RESOURCES FOR THE LONG-TERM BENEFIT OF SUNY POTSDAM WHILE ALSO PROVIDING THE MAXIMUM POSSIBLE CURRENT FINANCIAL SUPPORT TO THE COLLEGE AND ITS STUDENTS, CONSISTENT WITH THE WISHES OF THE FOUNDATION'S GENEROUS DONORS.
IRS990.Desc: THE POTSDAM COLLEGE FOUNDATION IS A NON-PROFIT CORPORATION, ESTABLISHED IN 1968 TO STEWARD THE CONTINUED GROWTH OF PRIVATE GIVING IN SUPPORT OF SUNY POTSDAM. THE FOUNDATION IS GOVERNED BY A VOLUNTEER BOARD OF TRUSTEES WHICH INCLUDES REPRESENTATION FROM SUNY POTSDAM'S ALUMNI, FACULTY, FACULTY EMERITI AND STUDENTS, AS WELL AS THE REGIONAL AND NATIONAL COMMUNITY. GIFTS TO THE FOUNDATION ARE USED TO PROVIDE ANNUAL SUPPORT TO MEET ONGOING CAMPUS NEEDS AND TO ESTABLISH PERMANENT ENDOWMENTS TO SUPPORT SUCH THINGS AS STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS AND PROGRAMS. IN ADDITION, THE FOUNDATION OWNS ART OBJECTS AND CULTURAL ARTIFACTS THAT ARE USED FOR TEACHING AND FOR DISPLAY ON THE CAMPUS. THE TOTAL ASSETS MANAGED BY THE FOUNDATION EXCEED $54.998 MILLION, INCLUDING AN ENDOWMENT COMPRISED OF GIFTS FROM BOTH INDIVIDUALS AND INVESTMENT RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE PRIMARY INTENDED USE OF THE ORGANIZATION'S ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS TO MAINTAIN A STEADY SOURCE OF FUNDING FOR STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS TO SUNY POTSDAM STUDENTS AND COLLEGE ASSISTANCE, INCLUDING FUNDS FOR CAMPUS IMPROVEMENTS AND VARIOUS OTHER COLLEGE PROGRAMS.

THE FOUNDATION IS EXEMPT FROM INCOME TAXES UNDER SECTION 501(C)(3) OF THE INTERNAL REVENUE CODE (THE "CODE"), THEREFORE, NO PROVISION FOR INCOME TAXES IS REFLECTED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS. THE FOUNDATION HAS BEEN CLASSIFIED AS A PUBLICLY SUPPORTED ORGANIZATION THAT IS NOT A PRIVATE FOUNDATION UNDER SECTION 509(A) OF THE CODE. THE FOUNDATION PRESENTLY DISCLOSES OR RECOGNIZES INCOME TAX POSITION BASED ON MANAGEMENT'S ESTIMATE OF WHETHER IT IS REASONABLY POSSIBLE OR PROBABLE THAT A LIABILITY HAS BEEN INCURRED FOR UNRECOGNIZED INCOME TAXES. MANAGEMENT HAS CONCLUDED THAT THE FOUNDATION HAS TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT IN ITS FINANCIAL STATEMENT. U.S. FORMS 990 FILED BY THE FOUNDATION ARE SUBJECT TO EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES. THE FOUNDATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO TAX EXAMINATION FOR THE YEARS ENDED JUNE 30, 2019, AND PRIOR.
CHANGE IN VALUE OF SPLIT INTEREST AGREEMENTS 4,394.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: STATE UNIVERSITY OF NEW YORK (SUNY POTSDAM)

RecipientTable.PurposeOfGrantTxt: PROGRAMS, CAMPUS IMPROVEMENTS, DEVELOPMENT, STUDENT SCHOLARSHIPS

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: RESTRICTIONS FOR EACH FUND/ACCOUNT ARE DOCUMENTED ON A DESIGNATION SCREEN WITHIN OUR DATABASE, MAKING THEM EASILY ACCESSIBLE AS ACCOUNTS PAYABLE REQUESTS ARE SUBMITTED. ADDITIONALLY, WHEN A FUND IS ENDOWED, A GIFT AGREEMENT IS GENERATED OUTLINING DONOR INTENT AND USE OF FUNDS. ALL ACCOUNTS ARE MONITORED AND REVIEWED ANNUALLY BY THE FOUNDATION BUSINESS OFFICE AND STEWARDSHIP OFFICE. ADDITIONALLY, ALL ACCOUNTS ARE REVIEWED SEMI-ANNUALLY WITH CAMPUS LEADERSHIP TO ENSURE PROPER USE IN ORDER TO MEET THE GREATEST NEEDS OF THE COLLEGE AND ITS PROGRAMS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: BOARD OF TRUSTEES REVIEWS AND APPROVES 990 PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF TRUSTEES ARE REQUIRED TO FILL OUT A CONFICT OF INTEREST FORM ON ANNUAL BASIS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL FORMS ARE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST.
